parameters: Must be the one that cut open the wolf's belly.
That's also a token, but can't be use to bring you home.
The magic core is break now.\|
This forest is released from the hunter and prey game...
This book will be the last trace of the Luby we know.
What happened here, air was thick with the smell of blood.
What happened here, air was thick with the smell of blood.
What happened here, air was thick with the smell of blood.
You are the biggest evil after all.
There must be hunters and preys in this forest.
Without the prey, the story of hunter will be ended.
You know what will happen if a story come to end.
Yes, I know.\| I understand that all too well.\|
But that doesn’t justify making the innocent into prey.
Wait, what are you talking about?\|
Wait, what are you talking about?\|
Wait, what are you talking about?\|
Why don't you tell the truth of this world to \P[1].
\|Tell him how you companions fade away.\^
Luby, all story will have an end.
After it new story will bron from it.
But the people in that new story won’t be the same anymore.
\|And I'm not going to let it happen.
Luby, you know the child of shadows.\|
They won't be convenced by you.
But I don’t want to kill them…\| like I did with Alex…
Don't worry, death is not the only end of a prey.\|
They could also become your loyal hounds instead.
I don’t want them to die, and I don’t want your story to end.\|
Luby, yeild.\| And stop that wicked spell.
If I stop, soon the forest will vanish.
And evrything in this forest will fadeout with it.\|
We are bound to the forest, a character can never leave its story.
Nothing can stop it from happening.
This world is began with stories,\|
and one day it shall end with them.
The only way to avoid that end is to continue the tale.
That’s not a reason to turn people into prey.
No, Alice. The story of hunters and wolves, predator and prey,\|
it’s the only theme that keeps the forest alive.
Luby, please… yield.\| I can hlep you leave your story.
The forest and I are bound together—
Maybe, it's not that bad after all.\|
Maybe the new story will be better than mine.
Hope we can meet again, even that's not me you know.
\|Just give me sometime, I will explain to you later.
\|Just give me sometime, I will explain to you later.
\|Just give me sometime, I will explain to you later.
Now you can be my firend for eternality!!!.
Great goddess who resides on the Isle of Aiu, your faithful follower prays to you.
Grant me the power to transform, and turn the person before me into my loyal hound.
There was once a story that echoed through the forest,
whispered by the trees and carried on the wind.
It told of a time when the Big Bad Wolf, driven by revenge,
As darkness swept through the woods,
two brave heroes stood out, defying
the shadow and facing the beast in a clash of wills.
their courage blazing like the dawn breaking through the night.
But their end remains a mystery,
a tale passed from voice to voice,
shifting like mist among the trees.
Some say they fell, becoming spirits bound to the forest,
while others believe they still roam,
watching over those who dare to wander too far.
Yet, these echoes never disturbed Little Red Riding Hood.
For now, she had two new loyal companions—faithful pets
who would forever assist her in the endless hunt,
bound to her side as shadows in the timeless dance of hunter and prey.
You are the biggest evil after all.
